txt.en: 'Hey, you! Get over here. You look like you got a rough pair of feet. This campaign is wearing on, and some of our trolls have been lost at daybreak, turning to stone after battles lasting long into the night.\n\n'They may be defeated, but the cave-stone itself can be reused. Go out there and reclaim it from the fallen trolls.'
'These will serve us well. But no time for poetry... get back to your post!'
'What are you doing back here? Get out there and bring me that stone!'
Sun-touched trolls remain on the battlefields of the Ettenmoors as the endless conflicts rage on, turned to stone by exposure to the light of the sun.
Sun-touched trolls can be found throughout the Ettenmoors.\n\nForzunk ordered you to collect slabs of troll-stone for the war-effort.
Bring the troll-stone to Forzunk at Gramsfoot
